Articles.Content:
Hi! I do not edit .cfgs often, so this is a bit of a noob question.

I am creating a "Junk" engine, or an engine that can run on (nearly) anything. However, it needs all of the resources in the game at any one time in order to run. Is there a way to allow it to run on only one resource?
Hmm You might be able to use multiple engine modules... other than that, there is no stock ingame module to accomplish that

You could probably make multiple generator modules, one for each stock resource, all making a custom resource (Junk or something) that the engine module uses.

If each generator has only one input resource, it should work.

Thanks! That's a really good idea.

Would anyone want a download? It seems simple enough to make on your own.
